author: Just Jared
title: Celine Dion Is Gorgeous in Green, Meets Lady Gaga at Grammys 2017!
text:
Tweet Celine Dion Is Gorgeous in Green, Meets Lady Gaga at Grammys 2017! 
Celine Dion looks beautiful while walking the red carpet at the 2017 Grammy Awards held at the Staples Center on Sunday (February 12) in Los Angeles. 
The 48-year-old singer had a cute moment meeting Lady Gaga on the carpet. 
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Celine Dion 
Celine is set to present on stage during the show this evening! 
FYI: Celine is wearing Zuhair Murad â€™s figure hugging long dress with a high slit, rendered in green emerald, with long sleeves and a plunging neckline from the Spring 2017 Couture collection. She accessorized with Dvani earrings. Just Jared on Facebook
